{url-website}[[website\]]

// {url-wiki}[[wiki\]]

Code formatter

== Installation

[,bash]
----
pnpm install prettier --save-dev
----

== Usage

Run for single file: 

[,bash]
----
npx prettier --write filename.js
----

Run for multiple files: 

[,bash]
----
npx prettier --write .
----

--write:: apply changes directly to the file instead of printing in the standard output.

== `.prettierrc`

[,json]
----
{
  "singleQuote": true,
  "semi": false,
  "tabWidth": 2
}
----

== `.prettierignore`
